casebody.data:
No. 10-8581. David A. Bardes, Petitioner v. John M. Magera, Individually and in His Official Capacity as State’s Attorney for South Carolina Department of Social Services, et al. 563 U.S. 907, 131 S. Ct. 1788,

179 L. Ed. 2d 660,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 2547. March 28, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 403 Fed. Appx. 862.
